column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////I've only been here twice
column2: but I have to write a review for this place.  On a Tuesday night
column3: this place is packed.  We are always waiting to devour some good ramen
column4: but let me tell you this... it's worth the wait.  So far
column5: this is one of my favorite ramen places in Houston.  The broths are very flavorful and you're super full after a bowl of ramen from here.
